answers.answer: I've been on maternity leave since my 29th week I'm 32 weeks tomorrow and I'm due January 8th. I was taken out by my doctor because of developing preeclampsia. I have to take it easy which is hard because I enjoy cooking and cleaning. But I have found small things to do like organize a photo album we have been Talking about for a couple years lol. But I am so bored until my husband gets home. Thankful I have an amazing hubby who is always home right after 4 since he is a teacher. he cooks, cleans and does whatever I ask. Of course before this happened he was always right beside me helping! I'm happy my doctor is not going to have me go to my due date. We are delivering my 37th week so only 5 more weeks of boredom!!

I like the photo album idea! With Christmas coming up im going to try and get creative with people's presents :) I have a 7year old daughter who keeps me busy before and after school hours and a fantastic hubby who gets home from work at 5.30ish but between those times I drive myself nuts lol Roll on these sleepless nights and dirty nappies :)
I wish I could go on maternity leave.. I'm 36 weeks and work on my feet for 8 hours a day.. No breaks.. I'm in pain.. Ugh.. I swear my baby girl is going to fall out it hurts so bad lol..
Even worse is that I am high risk.. And mid wives don't ever tell their patients to take maternity leave.. Well Atleast that's what my mid wife said.. :(

question: Im 32 weeks +1 day Due 6th Jan And iv been on maternity leave now for 4days and im sooooooo bored!!! I just want my boy here now , I know I should be enjoying this time but I just want him here now. Any1 else feeling this way ???
title: Maternity Leave
